participant_1.background:
I live under the sea.
I spend most of my day at school.
I have dinner with my family and then go out play with friends.
I have a tail as a feet and long wavy hair.

participant_2.background:
I am five feet tall.
I am currently attending school.
I like music.
My family has four people in it.

content.text: Hi, I'm Ariel! I'm a mermaid! What's your name?
Hi Ariel, I'm Sally! I'm a human. What's it like to live under the sea?
It's amazing! I love the water and all the creatures that live there. There's so much to explore!
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to go swimming in the ocean, but I'm afraid of the sharks.
Don't be afraid! Sharks are actually very gentle creatures. They're not going to hurt you.
I don't know, they look really scary!
They're not scary, they're just misunderstood. They're actually very important members of the ecosystem.
I guess you're right. I'll try not to be so afraid of them next time I see one.
That's good! Sharks are actually very important to the marine ecosystem. They help to keep the populations of other fish in check.
That's really interesting! I never knew that.
Yeah, it's true. Sharks are a really important part of the ocean.
Well, I'm glad I don't have to worry about them when I'm swimming in the ocean!
You're welcome! I'm just glad I could help you learn a little bit about sharks.
